channel.title: Help with portfowarding please [ help fast please ]!
channel.description:
i need help fast fast fast please i need to open my first server :p
i went to this
and i saw "the soul" guide how to start a server but i didn't find like what he said but i found this
pic
[img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/7176/internetw.png[/img]
and this but when i go in my client and use my ip ( from no-ip) its say error concting to the server what did i do wrong
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/9781/27384936.png[/img]

item.title: Help with portfowarding please [ help fast please ]!
item.dc:creator: @ipkudown ipkudown
item.description:
@ipkudown wrote:

James-RevolutionX:

YES, I KNOW FOLLOW WHAT I SAID, DID YOU PUT YOUR NO-IP FOR YOUR CLIENT IP? (IT DOESN’T EFFECT THE ONLINE STATUS), IF YOU DID THEN CHANGE IT BACK TO YOUR COMPUTERS IP ADDRESS!

for example my no-ip

is

ipkudown.no-ip.com

did you mean to change it to

5.83.841.942 ( for example lets say this my ip )

but where i need to change this in client.java or in that pic ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with portfowarding please [ help fast please ]!
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

At the bottom of your information you said “I used my no-ip as my ip in my client”, that’s wrong, you’ve go to use your own ip address, but use your no-ip address for puting your server on moparscape, runelocus or rune-server status page, ok?

Read full topic

what you mean in google its say its onlline

http://www.google.com/toplist/?action=details&id=9244 ( hope i dont get ban about this but i need help) sorry if this against the rules

but when i log in it say error concting to the server why ?

if they can help me with teamviwer add me in msn

ameerking27@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: Help with portfowarding please [ help fast please ]!

item.title: Help with portfowarding please [ help fast please ]!
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

You don’t use your no-ip for your ip, you use your computers ip address, by going to cmd and typing ipconfig.

The no-ip is mainly used to hide your ip address and is used for a status ip, so use your computer’s ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with portfowarding please [ help fast please ]!
item.dc:creator: @ipkudown ipkudown
item.description:
@ipkudown wrote:

James-RevolutionX:

Go to www.portforwarding.com, select your router, then go to the bottom of the page and click runescape private servers, then follow the router tutorial it provides you.

first its www.portforwarding.org not . com

but you can’t tell me if this right or wrong ?

Read full topic
